.method public static hidebysig !!TBuilder RequireHost<(class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IEndpointConventionBuilder) TBuilder>(!!TBuilder builder, string[] hosts) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function RequireHost(Of TBuilder As IEndpointConventionBuilder) (builder As TBuilder, ParamArray hosts As String()) As TBuilder
static member RequireHost : 'Builder * string[] -> 'Builder (requires 'Builder :> Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IEndpointConventionBuilder)

Docs.param: The to add the metadata to.
The hosts used during routing. Hosts should be Unicode rather than punycode, and may have a port. An empty collection means any host will be accepted.
Docs.summary: Requires that endpoints match one of the specified hosts during routing.
Docs.returns: A reference to this instance after the operation has completed.
